Room.Name: Nanette's Spa and Massage
Room.ShortDescription: This is a great place to be if you are injured and need to rest.
Room.LongDescription: Nanette has the best healing hands to be found, and the spa is the most relaxing you can find. At one time, Nanette studied to be a mage, but after a few spells went awry, she decided it wasn't the profession for her. Her best friend is still a toad, and she continues to try to change him back. Now if she could only decide which toad is him.
